findtalent_footer: Finddeveloper.net Inc. operates as a Private Employment Agency between 31/08/2018 and 30/08/2021 under License No. 170, issued in accordance with the decision dated 16.07.2018 and numbered 26124 by the Turkish Employment Agency. Pursuant to Law No. 4904, no fees shall be charged to job seekers and no financial benefit shall be obtained from them. For complaints, you may contact the phone numbers below.
